item.title: Material Icons in WPF
item.description: Icon Fonts with ligatures The key is using icon fonts with ligatures. This makes usage incredibly easy because you can directly use a sensible name instead of adding an extra resource for indirection of Unicode characters. Step 1 Download the icon font from https://material.io/resources/icons/ (or another resource) WPF supports both True Type Fonts (TTF) and Open Type Fonts (OTF). Extract the included ttf file from the archive. You can also download it here.
